author: akarasulu
msg: Start designs to implement some controls.

author: jmachols
msg: Moved BaseClientSession to LdapClientSession and changed ClientSession to
return an LdapPrincipal rather than a simple javax.security.Principal.

author: jmachols
msg: Noticed that the installer rebuilds never repackage the freshly built
sar file - they simply used the existing server.tar.bz2.  Fixed the problem
by adding a sars bundle specifically for placing the sar into the ${install
.dir}/apps directory along with the unraveled directory for the sar.  Moved
server bundle to now be called the phoenix bundle.  The sars bundle will be
rebuilt every time the installer is built and it has to.

author: jmachols
msg: Added new dependency by the ClientModule on the UnifiedBackend service. All
backends need to add this dependency to the assembly.xml.
